name: USDT
description: USDT (Tether USD) on the Solana blockchain is a fully collateralized stablecoin designed to maintain a 1:1 peg with the U.S. dollar (USD). Each USDT token represents one U.S. dollar held in reserve. Leveraging Solanaâ€™s high-speed, low-cost infrastructure, USDT enables near-instant transfers, minimal transaction fees, and seamless integration with Solana-based DeFi applications, exchanges, and payment systems. USDT on Solana provides a reliable, stable medium of exchange for trading, lending, and global value transfer.
